adjectives.description: scaddle (comparative more scaddle, superlative most scaddle)

entries.meaning: (UK, dialectal or obsolete) Wild, mischievous, thievish.
(UK, dialectal or obsolete, chiefly of animals) Timid, nervous, skittish.
